sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email">
    <sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <blind_copied/>
        <body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hi team,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">This is a reminder that there are pending leave application approvals that require your attention. Please review and approve them at your earliest convenience. </span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%;" border="1"><thead><tr><th>Number</th><th>Name</th><th>Date</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>LA0001054</td><td><a href="https://dev268649.service-now.com/u_employee_leave_tracker.do?sys_id=2d4ca2d483d1e210a946f896feaad318&amp;sysparm_record_target=u_employee_leave_tracker&amp;sysparm_record_row=-1&amp;sysparm_record_rows=1&amp;sysparm_record_list=u_approval=requested^sys_created_on>=javascript:gs.beginningOfLast7Days()//">Treesa Thomas</a></td><td>2025-04-30 07:22:26</td></tr></tbody></table><p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Regards,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Zynder Tech</span></p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot;Remainder for Leave Application Approval&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot;Remainder for Leave Application Approval&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;9ae8b348c381261052237405e401313c&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://dev268649.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=9ae8b348c381261052237405e401313c">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0001284_1C3rS9W5WGsWsZHEQk0Y</div></body></html></body>
        <body_text/>
        <checkpoint>0</checkpoint>
        <content_type>text/html</content_type>
        <copied/>
        <deleted>false</deleted>
        <direct>zyndersreerag@gmail.com</direct>
        <error_string/>
        <headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-9ae8b348c381261052237405e401313c
List-Unsubscribe:<mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?body=Sending+this+email+with+the+predefined+content+in+the+subject+and+body+will+unsubscribe+you+from+the+notification.%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe%3A%7B%22id%22%3A%229ae8b348c381261052237405e401313c%22%2C%22token%22%3A%22c797e62132%22%7D
 &subject=Unsubscribe+from+%22Remainder+for+Leave+Application+Approval%22>
X-ServiceNow-SysEmail-Version:2
</headers>
        <importance/>
        <instance>2d4ca2d483d1e210a946f896feaad318</instance>
        <mailbox display_value="Outbox">outbox</mailbox>
        <message_id/>
        <notification_type>SMTP</notification_type>
        <receive_type>new</receive_type>
        <recipients>zyndersreerag@gmail.com</recipients>
        <reply_to/>
        <state>ready</state>
        <status/>
        <subject>Pending leave approvals</subject>
        <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2025-05-04 18:30:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b21ca5f183dde210a946f896feaad332</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2025-05-04 18:30:10</sys_updated_on>
        <target_table>u_employee_leave_tracker</target_table>
        <type>send-ready</type>
        <uid>N/A</uid>
        <user/>
        <user_id/>
        <weight>0</weight>
    </sys_email>
</record_update>
